Dr. Mark Hoffman

Dr. Mark Hoffman's dental clinic welcomes you!
[/tm_pb_slide][tm_pb_slide background_image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/slide03.jpg" background_position="default" background_size="cover" background_color="#ffffff" use_bg_overlay="off" use_text_overlay="off" alignment="center" allow_player_pause="off" text_border_radius="3" header_font_select="default" header_font="||||" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" custom_button="off" button_font_select="default" button_font="||||" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" header_text_color="#ffffff" body_text_color="#ffffff"]
We're always available for customers with emergent dental problems.
You can easily reach us 24/7 via the phone number below: 555–123–2323   [/tm_pb_slide][tm_pb_slide button_text="Book an Appointment" button_link="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/book-an-appointments/" background_position="default" background_size="cover" background_color="#ffffff" use_bg_overlay="off" use_text_overlay="off" alignment="center" allow_player_pause="off" text_border_radius="3" header_font_select="default" header_font="||||" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" custom_button="off" button_font_select="default" button_font="||||" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" background_image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/slide02.jpg" header_text_color="#ffffff" body_text_color="#ffffff"]

Appointments

Booking an appointment at our dental clinic is as easy as it gets...

You will be able to schedule a convenient time for your meeting with our dentists with just 2 clicks!

[/tm_pb_slide] [/tm_pb_slider][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#0095e5" use_circle="off" circle_color="#f7f7f7" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#0095e5" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img41.jpg" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="left" disabled="off" disabled_on="|on|on" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" module_class="liner"]
Dr. Mark Hoffman
Dr. Mark Hoffman's dental clinic welcomes you!
[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="86" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="off" height_tablet="40" height_last_edited="on|phone" height_phone="25"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img09.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="off" sticky="off" align="left" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" module_class="img_add" custom_margin_tablet="||20px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_image][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Welcome to BeDentist

Dental clinic BeDentist welcomes you!
We're glad you hand your dental health concerns to our skilled hands. We'll make sure to deliver the best possible healthcare to all our patients! Of course, we always complement our main services with a customer service oriented approach. We sincerely believe that visiting a dentist shouldn't be a frightening or stressful experience! We provide an equally comfortable experience of relaxation for all our young and adult customers! Also we implement a lot of pain management and anesthesia options. Everything we do is aimed at making you feel comfortable, while we take care of your oral healthcare! It includes both local anesthesia for mouth-numbing as well as a sedative anesthesia. Altogether, this helps relief any pain which might occur in the process of treatment. All in all, we've got it all under control at our BeDentist dental health clinic. We invite you to explore the information about our dental office on our website! Feel free to read our terms and conditions and all the additional info we have posted here. Once our customer, you will be leaving our dental clinic with a bright, wide smile! [/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="83" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="off" height_tablet="50" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|tablet"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" global_module="197" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="off" background_color="#0095e5" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row global_parent="197" admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider global_parent="197" admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="80" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text global_parent="197" admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" module_class="invert"]

Why choose the BeDentist clinic?

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider global_parent="197" admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="39" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="30" height_phone="25" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row global_parent="197" admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb global_parent="197" admin_label="Blurb" title="Easy booking" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="f02d" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#0095e5" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#ffffff" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="50px" header_text_color="#ffffff" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" body_text_color="#ffffff" circle_size="133px" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet"] Booking an appointment at our dental clinic is as easy as doing 2 clicks! [/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb global_parent="197" admin_label="Blurb" title="Experience" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="f0c0" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#0095e5" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#ffffff" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="50px" header_text_color="#ffffff" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" body_text_color="#ffffff" circle_size="133px" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone"] Combined, our 5 dentists have over half a century of practical experience. They are ready to put it to action for you! [/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb global_parent="197" admin_label="Blurb" title="Flexible schedule" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="f017" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#0095e5" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#ffffff" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="50px" header_text_color="#ffffff" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" body_text_color="#ffffff" circle_size="133" custom_margin_phone="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone"] We work during all state holidays, besides working till late during the regular days. In case of emergencies we accept weekend bookings. [/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb global_parent="197" admin_label="Blurb" title="Best price guarantee" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="f087" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#0095e5" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#ffffff" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="50px" header_text_color="#ffffff" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" body_text_color="#ffffff" circle_size="133"] Our reasonable prices made thousands of people smile with a new, beautiful smile, as never before!! [/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row global_parent="197" admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider global_parent="197" admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="80" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="82" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|tablet"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Our services

And despite all other clinics being closed, BeDentist took my appointment! The result was beyond my expectations! [/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Daniela Robbery" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img16.jpg" quote_icon="on" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" testi_date="May 10, 2016"] Taking my kids to a dentist has never been easier. They just loved the welcoming and warm atmosphere in there! [/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="80" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|tablet"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="off" background_color="#0095e5" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="82" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="40" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_cta admin_label="Call To Action" title="How we can help..." button_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/book-an-appointments/" url_new_window="off" button_text="Book an Appointment" use_background_color="off" background_color="#0095e5" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_button="off" button_letter_spacing="0" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" button_letter_spacing_hover="0" module_class="invert" header_text_color="#ffffff" body_text_color="#ffffff"]
We offer a wide range of procedures to help you get the perfect smile.

item.title: About us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_section admin_label="section" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="off" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="16" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="15" height_phone="14" height_last_edited="on|desktop"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

About us

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="37" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="35" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img17.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="off" sticky="off" align="center" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] [/tm_pb_image][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="30" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="27" height_phone="25" height_last_edited="on|tablet"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img18.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="off" sticky="off" align="left" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" module_class="img_add2" custom_margin_phone="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop"] [/tm_pb_image][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
Our dental clinic has been founded in 2010. The founder is an honorable alumni of NYC's Columbia medical school - Mark Hoffmann, MD.

After 8 previous years of practicing, he and his colleagues collaborated to found their own clinic. Coming from backgrounds of miscellaneous dental institutions of the US, they complement each other. Their common clinic became known as BeDentist!

The state of Pennsylvania highly appreciates our contribution to state's dental healthcare. Just as as our local patients in the upstate Potter county of Pennsylvania. We combine extensive record of practical experience with an equal focus on customer service approach. In the last 6 years our dental clinic grew a list of returning clients! We look forward to you becoming one of them as well! [/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="100" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="80" height_phone="70" height_last_edited="on|desktop"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="off" background_color="#f7f7f7" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="80" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Medical Team

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="37" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="35" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|desktop"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" global_module="647" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" parallax_4="off" parallax_method_4="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member global_parent="647" admin_label="Person" name="Dr. Mark Hoffman" position="Dentist" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img19.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/dr-mark-hoffman/"] Our clinic's Chief Medical Officer, Dr. Mark Hoffman has been working in this field of medical specialization since 2002. After founding his own clinic in 2010 he brought all his experience here. Most of all he loves to see you walk out with a bright wide smile! [/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member global_parent="647" admin_label="Person" name="Leslie Gross" position="Dental Hygienist" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img20.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding_phone="30px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/leslie-gross/"] Leslie is one of the most experienced dental hygienists in the county. She works at our dental clinic since day 1. No one contributed more to our customer's satisfaction and concerns resolving, than her. [/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member global_parent="647" admin_label="Person" name="Dana Sims" position="Practical Nurse" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img21.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_padding_tablet="30px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/dana-sims/"] Dana previously served as a senior practical nurse at the Mayo clinic. She obtained her license by working hard after graduating from a medical college with cum laude honors. She truly represents all the care that our dental office is surrounded with and our patients feel that every time. [/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member global_parent="647" admin_label="Person" name="Kimberly Barker" position="Patient Services Manager" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img22.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding_tablet="30px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/kimberly-barker/"] Kimberly worked for numerous dental offices in the US and Canada during her 20 years long career. And while she will not drill your teeth personally, she will make sure that everything is running smoothly before, during and after your appointment! [/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="94" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|desktop"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" global_module="197" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="off" background_color="#0095e5" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row global_parent="197" admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider global_parent="197" admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="80" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50" height_phone="40" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text global_parent="197" admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" module_class="invert"]

Why choose the BeDentist clinic?

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider global_parent="197" admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="39" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="30" height_phone="25" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row global_parent="197" admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb global_parent="197" admin_label="Blurb" title="Easy booking" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="f02d" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#0095e5" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#ffffff" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="50px" header_text_color="#ffffff" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" body_text_color="#ffffff" circle_size="133px" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet"] Booking an appointment at our dental clinic is as easy as doing 2 clicks! [/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb global_parent="197" admin_label="Blurb" title="Experience" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="f0c0" icon_color="#ffffff" use_circle="on" circle_color="#0095e5" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#ffffff" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="50px" header_text_color="#ffffff" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" body_text_color="#ffffff" circle_size="133px" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone"] Combined, our 5 dentists have over half a century of practical experience. They are ready to put it to action for you! Dr.Mark Hoffman

MBBS, DCH, DRCOG, MRCGP
Our clinic's Chief Medical Officer, Dr. Mark Hoffman has been working in this field of medical specialization since 2002. A Columbia medical school graduate, this man excelled his dentistry skills while working in many dental offices across the US. Also, he encountered his future partners there. After founding his own clinic in 2010 he brought all his experience here. As well as the experience of 4 other fellow dentists, whom he brought into this new dental practice. Most of all he loves to see you walk into our office with a dental healthcare concern. Only before you walk out from us with a bright wide smile! Dana Sims

MBBS, DCH, DRCOG, MRCGP
Dana previously served as a senior practical nurse at the Mayo clinic. She obtained her license by working hard at numerous major dental offices. That's following her graduating from a medical college with cum laude honors. Ms. Sims truly represents all the care that our dental office is surrounded with.  We're sure that our patients feel that every time she takes care of their treatments. Being a professional with a medical degree, she is not a mere practical nurse. She's more like a coordinator at our dental clinic. Taking good care of both children after their teeth drilled and adults, elderly people... item.title: Leslie Gross
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_section admin_label="section"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="14" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="13" height_phone="12" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img28.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="left" sticky="off" align="left" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_phone="||10px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" module_class="img_add"] [/tm_pb_image][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Leslie Gross

MBBS, DCH, DRCOG, MRCGP
Leslie is one of the most experienced dental hygienists in the whole Potter county, PA. She works at our dental clinic since day 1. No one contributed more to our customer's satisfaction and concerns resolving than her. She is our best dentist, unopposed by anyone, perhaps except our CMO Mark Hoffmann, MD. She obtains a sum cum laude honors, 15 years of practical working experience and more than 10000 people serviced during her lifetime. Also, she thinks it is vital to propagate the oral hygiene healthy lifestyle.  Which she does by doing lectures in local schools of the Potter county, Pennsylvania. [tm_pb_section admin_label="section"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="14" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="13" height_phone="12" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="row"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_image admin_label="Image" src="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img29.jpg" show_in_lightbox="off" url_new_window="off" use_overlay="off" animation="left" sticky="off" align="left" force_fullwidth="off" always_center_on_mobile="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_phone="||10px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop" module_class="img_add"] [/tm_pb_image][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Kimberly Barker

MBBS, DCH, DRCOG, MRCGP
During her 20 years long career Kimberly worked for numerous dental offices in the US and Canada. And while she will not drill your teeth personally, she will make sure that everything is running smoothly. Before, during and after your appointment! Being the head of our special, customer services unit, Kimberly does her best to welcome you and accompany your treatment with us. She is an embodiment of our philosophy of constant customer care. That philosophy makes us focus on a full specter of services we deliver. It makes our patients feel not just healthier, but more happy and cheerful too! [tm_pb_section admin_label="section" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off" module_class="services-list"][tm_pb_row admin_label="row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="14" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="13" height_phone="12" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Our dental clinic's team provides many kinds of  dentistry services, such as:

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="42" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="35" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" parallax_4="off" parallax_method_4="off" column_padding_mobile="on" module_class="custom-services "][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="General and preventive care" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/general-and-preventative-care/" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#0095e5" use_circle="off" circle_color="#f7f7f7" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#0095e5" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img10.jpg" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|tablet"] A wide range for a preventative and general dentistry care. We put focus on examining root canals and the overview state of teeth's health. [/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Cosmetic solutions" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/cosmetic-solutions/" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#0095e5" use_circle="off" circle_color="#f7f7f7" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#0095e5" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img11.jpg" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_tablet="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone"] Our range of cosmetic dentistry solutions include such vitals as teeth whitening as well as a laser dentistry. [/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Restorative solutions" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/restorative-solutions/" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#0095e5" use_circle="off" circle_color="#f7f7f7" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#0095e5" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img12.jpg" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_phone="||30px|" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone"] Restoring teeth in bad condition is what we specialize in. It may include laser restoration and Invisalign service. [/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Additional treatments" url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/additional-treatments/" url_new_window="off" use_icon="off" icon_color="#0095e5" use_circle="off" circle_color="#f7f7f7" use_circle_border="off" circle_border_color="#0095e5" image="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img13.jpg" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_icon_font_size="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] People's dentistry issues may vary. That's why we have a lot of non-conventional treatments, including X-ray scanning. item.title: Avoiding bad breath
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Bad breath is a deal breaker both in business and in personal life of ours. And while breath fresheners or candies hide it, they do not cure the very problem at hand...

So, most importantly, the bad breath is caused by a lack of oral hygiene. It includes sleeping with an open mouth at night. This makes mouth dry and bacterias began to flourish there and cause that smell... Bad breath has a medical name "halitosis". This kind of condition can stem from poor oral hygiene habits. It also may be a telling sign of other health problems. What you're eating can cause this disease to progress much faster. So how healthy your menu is directly correlated with any oral hygiene problems.
So, how your diet and dishes choice affects the smell of your breath?
Essentially, everything you're consuming begins to be broken down into parts in your mouth. As dishes are digested and absorbed into the blood system, foods eventually get carried to your lungs. Then it reveals in your breath. This is even more true in case you like foods with strong odors (such as garlic or onions). Then teeth brushing and flossing, even mouthwash and any other breath freshening liquids are redundant. They merely disguise that kind of odor temporarily. The odor will not go away completely until the foods have passed through your body completely...

How damaging abundant amount of sugar is for your teeth health?

—John Doe
Which poor oral hygiene habits lead to the bad breath?
First off, ask yourself do you regularly follow basic oral hygiene routines? This, of course, includes such morning musts as brushing your teeth twice a day. Keep in mind, that each brushing should be lasting for at least 5 minutes. It's not limited to that. Teeth flossing after each eating is also strongly recommended. Because when you eat and don't follow these methods, food particles stay in your mouth. They get stuck in between the teeth, on gums and the tongue. Then it decays and absorbs there, causing various oral bacteria to flourish. All this results in a bad breath. Antibacterial mouth rinsers, instead of simple breath fresheners, may be of a big help here. It will not simply disguise the smell by replacing it with a nicer aroma. These antibacterial mouth rinsers will eventually fight off and kick out the bacteria from your mouth. As well as off the teeth, gums and tongue. To add to that you must keep an especially attentive eye on your dentures, if you have any. They are critically vulnerable towards the odor-causing bacteria. If the dentures are not cleaned properly, and even more importantly, regularly, it will get covered with invisible bacteria. This will be causing bad smells, that will be obvious to absolutely everyone around. There's also no better way to hazard you oral hygiene and health than smoking or chewing tobacco. Besides irritating the sensitive gums and making teeth yellow, this makes the bacterias prosper. It adds up to a smell too...
 Are there any specific health issues that are connected to a bad breath?
Such a thing as the periodontal disease may be an essential cause of the bad breath. So if smell and unpleasant taste in your mouth are a lasting issue, you'd better check with your dentist. Specifically on the matter of whether you have periodontal disease or not. Gum disease is caused by the appearance of plaque on teeth. Bacteria cause the formation of toxins to form, which irritate the gums and enamel. If such a gum disease carries on without any treatment to it provided, it can damage the gums and jawbone. Other dental causes of bad breath include poorly fitting dental appliances, yeast infections of the mouth, and denta The medical condition of the dry mouth (also called xerostomia) also can cause a bad smell. Saliva is necessary to moisten the mouth. It neutralizes acids produced by plaque and piles away the dead cells off the tongue, gums, and cheeks' insides. If not removed, these cells begin to decay and can cause bad breath. Dry mouth may be a side effect of various medications. Also salivary gland problems or breathing with your mouth open can be an additional cause. Many other general diseases and illnesses may cause bad breath. Here are some to be aware of: respiratory tract infections such as pneumonia or bronchitis, chronic sinus infections, postnasal drip, diabetes, chronic acid reflux, and liver or kidney problems.

To add to that you must keep an especially attentive eye on your dentures, if you have any. They are critically vulnerable towards the odor-causing bacteria. If the dentures are not cleaned properly, and even more importantly, regularly, it will get covered with invisible bacteria. This will be causing bad smells, that will be obvious to absolutely everyone around. There's also no better way to hazard you oral hygiene and health than smoking or chewing tobacco. Besides irritating the sensitive gums and making teeth yellow, this makes the bacterias prosper. It adds up to a smell too...
 Are there any specific health issues that are connected to a bad breath?
Such a thing as the periodontal disease may be an essential cause of the bad breath. So if smell and unpleasant taste in your mouth are a lasting issue, you'd better check with your dentist. Specifically on the matter of whether you have periodontal disease or not. Gum disease is caused by the appearance of plaque on teeth. Bacteria cause the formation of toxins to form, which irritate the gums and enamel. If such a gum disease carries on without any treatment to it provided, it can damage the gums and jawbone. Other dental causes of bad breath include poorly fitting dental appliances, yeast infections of the mouth, and denta The medical condition of the dry mouth (also called xerostomia) also can cause a bad smell. Saliva is necessary to moisten the mouth. It neutralizes acids produced by plaque and piles away the dead cells off the tongue, gums, and cheeks' insides. If not removed, these cells begin to decay and can cause bad breath. Dry mouth may be a side effect of various medications. Also salivary gland problems or breathing with your mouth open can be an additional cause. Many other general diseases and illnesses may cause bad breath. Here are some to be aware of: respiratory tract infections such as pneumonia or bronchitis, chronic sinus infections, postnasal drip, diabetes, chronic acid reflux, and liver or kidney problems.

[audio mp3="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/sound1.mp3"][/audio]

It also may be a telling sign of other health problems. What you're eating can cause this disease to progress much faster. Essentially, everything you're consuming begins to be broken down into parts in your mouth. As dishes are digested and absorbed into the blood system, foods eventually get carried to your lungs. Then it reveals in your breath. This is even more true in case you like foods with strong odors (such as garlic or onions). It may take care of purely aesthetic concerns of the patient (teeth whitening, straightening; etc...). Also, it may involve fixing teeth that were mechanically damaged or chipped off. Sometimes it involves Dental Filling and Bonding, which are quite simple dental procedures. Usually, they do not require numbing or any kind of anesthesia applied. item.title: Pricing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_section admin_label="section"][tm_pb_row admin_label="row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="off" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" background_color="#ffffff" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

Pricing

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="50px" divider_style="solid" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="40px" height_phone="30px" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_pricing_tables admin_label="Pricing Tables" show_bullet="off" center_list_items="off" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_button="off" button_letter_spacing="0" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" button_letter_spacing_hover="0" remove_featured_drop_shadow="off" module_class="custom-table"] [tm_pb_pricing_table featured="off" title="Monthly checkups with a dental hygienist" currency="$" per="30 minutes " sum="150" button_url="#" button_text="Book an Appointment" header_font_select="default" header_font="||||" header_font_size="30" header_font_size_tablet="30" header_font_size_phone="30" subheader_font_select="default" subheader_font="||||" currency_frequency_font_select="default" currency_frequency_font="||||" currency_frequency_font_size="50px" currency_frequency_font_size_tablet="50px" currency_frequency_font_size_phone="50px" price_font_select="default" price_font="||||" price_font_size="50" price_font_size_tablet="50" price_font_size_phone="50" price_text_color="#0095e5" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" custom_button="off" button_font_select="default" button_font="||||" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" currency_frequency_text_color="#0095e5" background_color="#f7f7f7" body_text_color="#616262" body_line_height="1.2" body_line_height_tablet="1" body_line_height_phone="1"] Checking your dental health is crucial. Regular checkups with our dental hygienists will ensure that no problem goes unnoticed and unfixed. [/tm_pb_pricing_table][tm_pb_pricing_table featured="on" title="Dental restoration series" currency="$" per="30 minutes " sum="300" button_url="#" button_text="Book an Appointment" header_font_select="default" header_font="||||" header_font_size="40" header_font_size_tablet="30" header_font_size_phone="30" subheader_font_select="default" subheader_font="||||" currency_frequency_font_select="default" currency_frequency_font="||||" currency_frequency_font_size="50px" currency_frequency_font_size_tablet="50px" currency_frequency_font_size_phone="50px" price_font_select="default" price_font="||||" price_font_size="50" price_font_size_tablet="50" price_font_size_phone="50" price_text_color="#ffffff" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" custom_button="off" button_font_select="default" button_font="||||" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" currency_frequency_text_color="#ffffff" background_color="#0095e5" subtitle="Best Value" header_text_color="#ffffff" subheader_text_color="#ffffff" body_text_color="#ffffff" subheader_font_size="20" subheader_font_size_tablet="20" subheader_font_size_phone="20" header_line_height="1" header_line_height_tablet="1" header_line_height_phone="1" body_line_height="1.2" body_line_height_tablet="1" body_line_height_phone="1"] This pack will be perfect for people who either have a lot of teeth in a need of restoration, or want to patch them up on a regular basis as a part of a preventative oral care. [/tm_pb_pricing_table][tm_pb_pricing_table featured="off" title="Teeth Whitening - 5 Sessions" currency="$" per="60 minutes " sum="750" button_url="#" button_text="Book an Appointment" header_font_select="default" header_font="||||" header_font_size="30" header_font_size_tablet="30" header_font_size_phone="30" subheader_font_select="default" subheader_font="||||" currency_frequency_font_select="default" currency_frequency_font="||||" currency_frequency_font_size="50px" currency_frequency_font_size_tablet="50px" currency_frequency_font_size_phone="50px" price_font_select="default" price_font="||||" price_font_size="50" price_font_size_tablet="50" price_font_size_phone="50" price_text_color="#0095e5" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" custom_button="off" button_font_select="default" button_font="||||" button_use_icon="default" button_icon_placement="right" button_on_hover="on" currency_frequency_text_color="#0095e5" background_color="#f7f7f7" body_text_color="#616262" body_line_height="1.2" body_line_height_tablet="1" body_line_height_phone="1"] Teeth whitening will make your smile stand out again and shine bright! Nevertheless, this procedure requires a regular maintenance of that effect.  That is the reason that we provide these 5 teeth whitening sessions as a pack. [/tm_pb_pricing_table] [/tm_pb_pricing_tables][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="29px" divider_style="solid" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="27px" height_phone="25px" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="off" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" column_padding_mobile="on" module_class="service-info" background_color="#ffffff"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="57px" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="40" height_phone="30" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
Call the BeDentist, your dental healthcare clinic:
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="555–123–2323" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="f095" icon_color="#0095e5" use_circle="on" circle_color="#ffffff" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#0095e5" icon_placement="left" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" circle_size="80" circle_border_width="1" icon_font_size="50px"] [/tm_pb_blurb][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
Service Cost: $99.00
Duration:  1h 20m [/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="80px" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50px" height_phone="40px" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section][tm_pb_section admin_label="Section" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" transparent_background="off" background_color="#f7f7f7" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off"][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="off" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" background_color="#f7f7f7" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="60px" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="50px" height_phone="40px" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

What our patients say

[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="7" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="6" height_phone="5" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="off" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" background_color="#f7f7f7" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Herbert Wallace " url="#" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img14.jpg" quote_icon="on" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116"] I urgently required dental help last 4th of July. And despite all other clinics being closed, BeDentist took my appointment! [/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Gary Growles " url="#" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img15.jpg" quote_icon="on" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] Comparing teeth whitening prices here and elsewhere, I picked BeDentist. The result was beyond my expectations! [/tm_pb_testimonial][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_3"][tm_pb_testimonial admin_label="Testimonial" author="Daniela Robbery" url="#" url_new_window="off" portrait_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img16.jpg" quote_icon="on" use_background_color="off" background_color="#f5f5f5" text_orientation="left" portrait_border_radius="50%" portrait_width="116" portrait_height="116" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"] Taking my kids to a dentist has never been easier. They just loved the welcoming and warm atmosphere in there! item.title: FAQs
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_section admin_label="section" transparent_background="on" allow_player_pause="off" inner_shadow="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" padding_mobile="off" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" width_unit="on" make_equal="off" use_custom_gutter="off" module_class="faqs"][tm_pb_row admin_label="row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

FAQs

You can use our website calculator to approximate a price for your dental appointment. Specify appointment details and see the projections of how much exactly will it cost you! [/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="20" divider_style="solid" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="18" height_phone="16" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
Q:  Do you provide dental care for patients covered under a Medicaid plan?
A:  Yes, we provide dental care for anyone who has this type of healthcare included. Regardless of whether it is under their Medicaid, Affordable Care Act or any other similar healthcare insurance plan. [/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
Q:  How long is the first appointment?
A:  It may vary, but generally speaking, the first appointment will be merely a consulting one. Our dentist or dental hygienist will be checking the overall state of your oral health. Then a dentist will provide recommendations on any further dental procedures you might need. [/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
Q:  Who performs my treatment?
A:  We have a dedicated team of 5 different dentists. Each of them has a profound medical experience and degree. Also, we have a practical nurse and dental hygienists in our clinic’s team. Our staff will be more than enough to provide a timely, efficient dental care for all of our patients! [/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
Q:  Why is visiting the dentist so important?
A:   Visiting the dentist on a regular, monthly basis will not only help keep your teeth and oral health in tact. It will also help keep the rest of your body healthy.
Dental care is important because it:
  • Fights teeth decay
  • Helps to prevent miscellaneous periodontal (gum) diseases, which eventually can lead to tooth loss
  • Prevents bad breath. So besides brushing and flossing, seeing the dentist regularly will help eliminate the bacteria that causes a bad smell
  • Awards you with a snow-shite smile and a new breath of confidence!
  • Helps keep teeth shiny by preventing them being stained by food, drinks, and cigarettes
  • Makes your teeth stronger which allows you to eat any food you want, at any age!
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
Q:  My teeth feel fine; do I still need to see a dentist?
A:    You may feel fine and think that your oral health is at no risk. But the thing is, that only a professional dentist can detect dental problems on early stages. This might happen only during a regular dental checkup. Caries, food staining, gums problems and teeth weakening are just a few such issues that can go unnoticed for quite a while. Also, you need to take advantage of all the modern dental medicine to fix any issues you did not fix earlier (like broken, chipped teeth etc...). [/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
Q:  How can I take care of my teeth in between dental checkups?
A:  
  • Do not forget to brush your teeth, at least, two times a day (5 minutes each time). Floss at least once a day!
  • Use only a fluoride containing toothpaste. Ask your dentist if you also might need a fluoride rinse. This will prevent any cavities in the future!
  • Avoid sugary drinks, foods and cigarettes as much as possible. These harm the overall immunity of your mouth and stain your teeth badly.
  • When brushing teeth, brush your tongue as well! By doing so you will remove food particles and reduce the amount of mouth bacteria.
  • Tongue brushing will make your breath much fresher!
  • Be sure to schedule your regular, routine check-ups. It is recommended to check your teeth at least twice a year or even more often.
[/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
Q:   At what age should I start taking my child to see the dentist?
A:    We recommend you start taking kids as young as 5 years old to a regular dental healthcare checkups. [/tm_pb_text][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
Q:   When should I change my toothbrush?
A:     It is highly recommended to change your toothbrush once in every month! That's based on what a majority of American dental institutions and numerous researches strongly suggest. [/tm_pb_text][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section]

After founding his own clinic in 2010 he brought all his experience here. Most of all he loves to see you walk out with a bright wide smile! [/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member global_parent="647" admin_label="Person" name="Leslie Gross" position="Dental Hygienist" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img20.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding_phone="30px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/leslie-gross/"] Leslie is one of the most experienced dental hygienists in the county. She works at our dental clinic since day 1. No one contributed more to our customer's satisfaction and concerns resolving, than her. [/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member global_parent="647" admin_label="Person" name="Dana Sims" position="Practical Nurse" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img21.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_padding_tablet="30px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/dana-sims/"] Dana previously served as a senior practical nurse at the Mayo clinic. She obtained her license by working hard after graduating from a medical college with cum laude honors. She truly represents all the care that our dental office is surrounded with and our patients feel that every time. [/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member global_parent="647" admin_label="Person" name="Kimberly Barker" position="Patient Services Manager" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img22.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding_tablet="30px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/kimberly-barker/"] Kimberly worked for numerous dental offices in the US and Canada during her 20 years long career. And while she will not drill your teeth personally, she will make sure that everything is running smoothly before, during and after your appointment! [/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="20" divider_style="solid" hide_on_mobile="on" height_tablet="18" height_phone="16" height_last_edited="on|phone"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][/tm_pb_section]

item.title: Service Info
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="off" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" column_padding_mobile="on" module_class="service-info" template_type="row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="40" divider_style="solid" divider_position="top" hide_on_mobile="on"] [/tm_pb_divider][tm_pb_text admin_label="Text" text_orientation="center" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]
Call the BeDentist, your dental healthcare clinic:

item.title: Team
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" parallax_3="off" parallax_method_3="off" parallax_4="off" parallax_method_4="off" column_padding_mobile="on" template_type="row"][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Dr. Mark Hoffman" position="Dentist" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img19.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/dr-mark-hoffman/"]

Our clinic's Chief Medical Officer, Dr. Mark Hoffman has been working in this field of medical specialization since 2002. After founding his own clinic in 2010 he brought all his experience here.
Most of all he loves to see you walk out with a bright wide smile!

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Leslie Gross" position="Dental Hygienist" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img20.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding_phone="30px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/leslie-gross/"]

Leslie is one of the most experienced dental hygienists in the county. She works at our dental clinic since day 1.
No one contributed more to our customer's satisfaction and concerns resolving, than her.

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Dana Sims" position="Practical Nurse" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img21.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_padding_tablet="30px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|desktop" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/dana-sims/"]

Dana previously served as a senior practical nurse at the Mayo clinic. She obtained her license by working hard after graduating from a medical college with cum laude honors. She truly represents all the care that our dental office is surrounded with and our patients feel that every time.

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_4"][tm_pb_team_member admin_label="Person" name="Kimberly Barker" position="Patient Services Manager" image_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/img22.jpg" animation="off" background_layout="light" facebook_url="https://www.facebook.com/TemplateMonster" twitter_url="https://twitter.com/templatemonster" google_url="https://plus.google.com/+TemplateMonster" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" custom_margin_last_edited="on|phone" custom_padding_tablet="30px|||" custom_padding_last_edited="on|phone" custom_url="http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_58654-sample/kimberly-barker/"]

Kimberly worked for numerous dental offices in the US and Canada during her 20 years long career. And while she will not drill your teeth personally, she will make sure that everything is running smoothly before, during and after your appointment!

[/tm_pb_team_member][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row]

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Flexible schedule" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="f017" icon_color="#0095e5" use_circle="on" circle_color="#ffffff" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#0095e5" icon_placement="top" animation="off" text_orientation="center" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="50px" circle_size="137" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" body_line_height="1.2"]

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row"][tm_pb_column type="4_4"][tm_pb_divider admin_label="Divider" color="#ffffff" show_divider="off" height="20px" divider_style="solid" hide_on_mobile="off"] [/tm_pb_divider][/tm_pb_column][/tm_pb_row][tm_pb_row admin_label="Row" make_fullwidth="off" use_custom_width="off" use_grid_padding="on" width_unit="on" padding_mobile="off" allow_player_pause="off" parallax="off" parallax_method="off" make_equal="off" parallax_1="off" parallax_method_1="off" parallax_2="off" parallax_method_2="off" column_padding_mobile="on"][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Easy booking" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="f02d" icon_color="#0095e5" use_circle="on" circle_color="#ffffff" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#0095e5" icon_placement="left" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="40px" circle_size="85" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" body_line_height="1.2"]

Booking an appointment at our dental clinic is as easy as doing 2 clicks!

[/tm_pb_blurb][/tm_pb_column][tm_pb_column type="1_2"][tm_pb_blurb admin_label="Blurb" title="Experience" url_new_window="off" use_icon="on" font_icon="f0c0" icon_color="#0095e5" use_circle="on" circle_color="#ffffff" use_circle_border="on" circle_border_color="#0095e5" icon_placement="left" animation="off" text_orientation="left" use_icon_font_size="on" icon_font_size="40px" circle_size="85" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" body_line_height="1.2"]

Combined, our 5 dentists have over half a century of practical experience. They are ready to put it to action for you!

Cosmetic dental care is an essential part of our modern life. It may take care of purely aesthetic concerns of the patient (teeth whitening, straightening; etc...). Also, it may involve fixing teeth that were mechanically damaged or chipped off. Sometimes it involves Dental Filling and Bonding, which are quite simple dental procedures. Usually, they do not require numbing or any kind of anesthesia applied.

Cosmetic dental care is an essential part of our modern life. It may take care of purely aesthetic concerns of the patient (teeth whitening, straightening; etc...). Also, it may involve fixing teeth that were mechanically damaged or chipped off. Sometimes it involves Dental Filling and Bonding, which are quite simple dental procedures. Usually, they do not require numbing or any kind of anesthesia applied.
